sentences.en: Children swim at the pool, under the watchful eye of lifeguards.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在救生员的监护下在水池里游泳。

sentences.en: He a silent guardian, a watchful protector, a dark knight.
sentences.cn: 他是静默的卫士, 是机警的守护神, 是黑暗骑士.

sentences.en: He committed hooliganism even under the watchful eyes of the people.
sentences.cn: 他竟在众目睽睽之下犯下了流氓罪.

sentences.en: He looked tall and powerful and, with his dark, watchful face, a little threatening.
sentences.cn: 他看上去又高又壮，面色黝黑，满脸警觉，真叫人有点害怕。

sentences.en: He ran his hand into his pocket and looked at me with cold, watchful eyes.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸到他的口袋里,用冷冰冰的, 戒备的眼光看着我.

sentences.en: He's a silent guardian, a watchful protector, A DARK KNIGHT.
sentences.cn: 他是一位沉默的守护者, 一位警觉的保护者, 一位黑夜骑士.

sentences.en: Her expression was watchful and alert.
sentences.cn: 她露出一副察言观色、处处提防的表情。

sentences.en: It is important that health organizations remain watchful.
sentences.cn: 卫生组织保持警惕是极为重要的.

sentences.en: Keep a watchful eye on babies and toddlers.
sentences.cn: 要看好婴儿和刚会走路的孩子。

sentences.en: Schryhart, Hand , Arneel and Merrill were quietly watchful.
sentences.cn: 希利哈, 韩德, 阿尼耳和麦利耳都在静静地注意着.

sentences.en: She was watchful for any sign of activity in the empty house.
sentences.cn: 她对空房中的任何动静都很警觉.

sentences.en: The best thing is to be watchful and see the family doctor for any change in your normal health.
sentences.cn: 最佳的做法是保持警惕，一旦你的身体状况有任何变化就立即去看家庭医生。

sentences.en: The entrances are guarded by watchful security staff.
sentences.cn: 入口处由警惕的保安人员把守。

sentences.en: The fellow turned a keen , watchful face on the inquirer.
sentences.cn: 这个小伙子把脸转向问话的人, 表情敏锐而机警.

sentences.en: To this end the young child is forever watchful.
sentences.cn: 这个年纪不大的孩子为此始终保持警惕。

sentences.en: We must be on our guard, watchful, prepared, vigilant.
sentences.cn: 我们必须当心 、 警惕 、 有准备和警醒.

trans.tran_en: very careful to notice what is happening, and to make sure that everything is all right
